why_raja_ampat_for_demo: Epicenter of global marine biodiversity - more coral and fish species than anywhere on Earth
Blue Park Award-winning MPA network with innovative entrance fee funding model
Demonstrates Nereus valuation in the Coral Triangle - world's coral stronghold
demo_value.investor_story: Raja Ampat is the crown jewel of marine biodiversity - home to 75% of the world's known coral species and 1,600 reef fish species. Its 9-MPA network, funded by tourism entrance fees and recognized with a Blue Park Award, generates $78M/year in ecosystem services while protecting the world's last great coral stronghold. Under Indonesia's sovereign blue bond program, Raja Ampat demonstrates how biodiversity conservation and blue finance converge. Nereus rates Raja Ampat AA - exceptional ecological value with a proven community-based conservation model.
